SELECT m.id AS member_id , m.company_name , m.uid , coalesce (sd.total_cnt, 0) AS total_cnt , coalesce (sd.normal_cnt, 0) AS normal_cnt , coalesce (sd.repair_cnt, 0) AS repair_cnt , coalesce (sd.dispose_cnt, 0) AS dispose_cnt FROM (SELECT id ,company_name ,uid FROM member.member WHERE utype = 'S' AND status = 'A'
AND company_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%')
AND uid LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%')
) m
JOIN
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT sd.member_id , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM public.ssp_device WHERE member_id = sd.member_id) total_cnt , COUNT(CASE WHEN sd.status = 'Y' THEN sd.status END) AS normal_cnt , COUNT(CASE WHEN sd.status = 'R' THEN sd.status END) AS repair_cnt , COUNT(CASE WHEN sd.status = 'D' THEN sd.status END) AS dispose_cnt FROM public.ssp_device sd JOIN public.ssp_product sp ON sd.product_id = sp.id LEFT JOIN public.ssp_motor sm ON sm.id = sd.motor_id
sp.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%')
sd.serial_number LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%')
sm.car_number LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%')
GROUP BY sd.member_id ) AS sd ON sd.member_id = m.id ORDER BY m.id
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT id ,company_name ,uid FROM member.member WHERE utype = 'S' AND status = 'A'
AND company_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%')
AND uid LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%')
) m
JOIN
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT sd.member_id , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM public.ssp_device WHERE member_id = sd.member_id) total_cnt , COUNT(CASE WHEN sd.status = 'Y' THEN sd.status END) AS normal_cnt , COUNT(CASE WHEN sd.status = 'R' THEN sd.status END) AS repair_cnt , COUNT(CASE WHEN sd.status = 'D' THEN sd.status END) AS dispose_cnt FROM public.ssp_device sd JOIN public.ssp_product sp ON sd.product_id = sp.id LEFT JOIN public.ssp_motor sm ON sm.id = sd.motor_id
sp.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%')
sd.serial_number LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%')
sm.car_number LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%')
GROUP BY sd.member_id) AS sd ON sd.member_id = m.id

SELECT m.uid , m.company_name , device_t.* , sp.product_name , sp.screen_resolution , coalesce (schedule_t.slot_cnt, 0) AS slot_cnt FROM public.ssp_product sp JOIN public.ssp_category sc ON sc.id = sp.category_id JOIN member.member m ON m.id = sc.member_id JOIN (SELECT sd.id AS device_id , sd.member_id , sd.product_id , sd.serial_number , sd.status , sd.notes , coalesce(sm.id, 0) AS motor_id , coalesce(sm.car_number, 'zz') AS car_number , TO_CHAR(sd.insert_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS insert_date FROM public.ssp_device sd LEFT JOIN public.ssp_motor sm ON sm.id = sd.motor_id) AS device_t ON device_t.product_id = sp.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT sp2.product_id , s.cpp_slot_count + s.cpm_slot_count AS slot_cnt FROM public.schedule_product sp2 JOIN public.schedule s ON s.id = sp2.schedule_id) AS schedule_t ON schedule_t.product_id = sp.id WHERE m.utype = 'S' AND m.status = 'A'
AND device_t.status = #{status}
AND m.company_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%')
AND m.uid LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%')
AND sp.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%')
AND device_t.serial_number LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%')
AND device_t.car_number LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%')
ORDER BY device_t.car_number DESC, device_t.device_id DESC

SELECT m.id AS member_id , m.uname , m.company_email , m.email , sd.id AS device_id , sd.model_name , sd.serial_number , to_char(sd.update_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS update_date FROM public.ssp_device sd JOIN member.member m ON m.id = sd.member_id WHERE sd.id = #{ssp_device_id}
